properties.address: 19 Cromwell Street, Stornoway, Western Isles HS1 2DA
properties.description: Our library is open to everyone, help yourself to a coffee,tea or hot chocolate in our front Space. There are board games and Lego available to use. You can also browse our collection of books, local magazines and newspapers to enjoy with your hot drink.
properties.title: Stornoway Library
